tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Toothache,Painful Teething,
review: *** ***** ** ********* *** **** ** *** ****** before visiting him, I had seen a doctor at my locality, who did filling in the wisdom tooth. the filling was not aligned properly and it started pinching my cheeks from inside. This caused swelling inside my mouth I was no longer able to open my mouth properly.Thank God my sister recommended to visit Dr. Tarun.  He understood my problem and did surgery to remove my tooth. this took less thank 45 minutes without any pain.All the discomfort and pain was gone which killing me for 4 days.I would certainly recommend this clinic to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Laser Gum Surgery,Dental Fillings,
review: I appreciate the way the dental cause was explained to me. My comfort was well considered throughout the entire procedure. Appointments were made according to my convenience and thus, there was no waiting time needed to begin the procedure at each appointment. Whole staff has offered the comfort as well.

Worst of all my experiences in Delhi. I went there for orthodontic procedure which involved alignment of my upper and lower jaws. The doctors assured me that it can be done and demanded  Rs9000 on the spot. They seemed confident and we discussed the procedure in detail. So, I was satisfied and treatment started. It was by the end of one month that I started getting suspicious. They started talking of minor fixes only and hinted at ending the treatment after that. I was taken back by the approach. When asked they replied that the treatment is not possible for an adult! After about a week of repeated heated arguments, Dr. Tarun Ahuja finally agreed to refund some of my payment. He charged Rs6000 for a month ** ****** *********** My exams were closing in and I just wanted the nightmare to end. It's over now but I feel morally obligated to warn others of such hoax. Please be careful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
